GSD.description:
media: cx88: Fix a null-ptr-deref bug in buffer_prepare()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 644d5a87ab1863eb606526ea743021752a17e9cb. For more details please see the references link.
